title: [Valley of Gold, Bazaar]
description: Cleared of vegetation and lined with rocks, the path meanders through the field.  Flowering bushes give a burst of color to area.  Bright crimson banners emblazoned with a golden sunburst fly from varnished oak poles.  Their dazzling colors shimmer in the brilliant sunlight.

Cleared of vegetation and lined with rocks, the path meanders through the field.  Flowering bushes give a burst of color to area.  Bright crimson banners emblazoned with a golden sunburst fly from varnished oak poles.  Their dazzling colors shimmer in the pale moonlight.
location: between Wehnimer's Landing and Zul Logoth
